programme.desc: We will be learning how to answer a Speaking Test and focus on the Part 3 question, which is a discussion task done in pairs. Learn some useful skills on how to do well in a Speaking Test.

programme.title: SPM Prinsip Perakaunan Ep07
programme.desc: Ulang kaji bersama Zach dan Nina dalam misi mereka merangka strategi untuk skor dalam kertas SPM Prinsip Perakaunan.

programme.title: SPM Prinsip Perakaunan Ep08
programme.desc: Nina berkongsi tip dan strategi menjawab soalan dengan Zach mengenai penyediaan akaun kelab dan persatuan.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Cina Ep06
programme.desc: Focuses on Complex Sentence with questions and explanation and how to write a proper Announcement.

programme.title: SPM Bahasa Cina Ep07
programme.desc: Focuses on Rhetoric (Part 1) with questions and explanation and a full example of Argumentative Composition and explanation.

programme.title: SPM Ekonomi Asas Ep07
programme.desc: Pelajari tentang Perbelanjaan dan Hutang Negara. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan esei, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Ekonomi Asas Ep08
programme.desc: Pelajari tentang Eksport dan Import. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan esei, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Geografi Ep05
programme.desc: Dapatkan tip-tip dan teknik menjawab bagi pelbagai soalan menangani pelbagai soalan mengenai taburan dan perubahan penduduk.

programme.title: SPM Geografi Ep06
programme.desc: Dapatkan tip-tip dan teknik menjawab bagi pelbagai soalan menangani pelbagai soalan mengenai fungsi petempatan dan proses pembandaran.

programme.title: SPM Sejarah Ep17
programme.desc: Kertas 1 - Ulang kaji tentang Perkembangan di Eropah. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan objektif, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Sejarah Ep18
programme.desc: Kertas 2 - Ulang kaji Perkembangan di Eropah. Turut merangkumi contoh soalan struktur, huraian jawapan, penjelasan dan tip-tip lain.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Sejarah Ep01
programme.desc: Cikgu Kamal memperkenalkan topik Sistem Ahli kepada anda, dan berkongsi bagaimana untuk menjawab soalan-soalan yang berkaitan. Saksikanlah Top Tutor anda ini dengan gayanya yang tersendiri.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Sejarah Ep02
programme.desc: Kerajaan Islam di Madinah merupakan topik pilihan dalam episod ini. Cikgu Kamal berkongsi formula-formula khasnya untuk mengingati fakta-fakta penting dan menjawab pelbagai soalan.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Biology Ep01
programme.desc: This episode focuses on Respiration topic. Divided into Paper 1 and Paper 2 questions. Let's join our tutor discussing tips and how to avoid common errors.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Biology Ep02
programme.desc: This episode focuses on Dynamic Ecosystem topic. Divided into Paper 1 and Paper 2 questions. Let's join our tutor discussing tips and how to avoid common errors.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Geografi Ep01
programme.desc: Gerakan Jisim merupakan topik yang amat popular dalam peperiksaan Geografi SPM. Ingin skor markah yang tinggi - saksikan episod ini bersama Cikgu Rajan dan ketahui rahsia menjawab soalan dengan tepat.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Geografi Ep02
programme.desc: Tindakan air mengalir meninggalkan pelbagai kesan di atas muka bumi kita ini. Cikgu Rajan menghuraikan setiap fenomena alam ini, dan menjawab soalan berdasarkan topik ini.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Prinsip Perakaunan Ep01
programme.desc: Cikgu Rosel menerangkan cara-cara untuk menjawab soalan berdasarkan Belanjawan Tunai dalam episod ini. Jangan ketinggalan jika ingin berjaya dalam peperiksaan SPM!

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Prinsip Perakaunan Ep02
programme.desc: Akaun Kawalan merupakan topik hangat yang dibincangkan oleh Cikgu Rosel dalam episod ini. Ikuti langkah-langkah menjawab soalan untuk mencapai keputusan yang cemerlang.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep01
programme.desc: Perimeters and Areas of Circles - Students are shown how to calculate the perimeter and area of a sector and also taken through clone questions in order to work out the answer.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Mod Maths Ep02
programme.desc: Circle and Angle Properties - Students are shown how to use these properties or laws to find the value of the missing angle.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Add Maths Ep01
programme.desc: Indices and Logarithms - Tutor explains the laws of indices and notations, then shows how to use these laws to solve an unknown (x or y) using the comparison rule.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor Add Maths Ep02
programme.desc: Simultaneous Equation - In this episode, students are shown how to solve liner and non- linear equations using the substitution method.

programme.title: SPM Top Tutor English Ep01
programme.desc: Section A of Paper 1:Directed Writing focusing on Report Writing. The report writing format, planning and expanding the notes are discussed in detail to help students score high marks in this section.

programme.desc: Inspired by Bellevue, the oldest public hospital in America, this medical drama follows the charming Dr. Max Goodwin, the institution's newest medical director, who sets out to tear up the bureaucracy.

programme.title: The Unicorn S1 Ep04
programme.desc: When Wade changes the password to his online dating profile because his friends become too involved, Forrest goes to great lengths to keep tabs on him.

programme.title: The Kelly Clarkson Show S2 Ep145
programme.desc: 'The Kelly Clarkson Show' is daytime's newest destination for humor, heart, and connection, featuring three-time Grammy Award winning singer/songwriter, Kelly Clarkson.

programme.title: MasterChef US S10 Ep17
programme.desc: The mystery deepens as the home cooks find a box within a box within a Mystery Box. Using the ingredients they find, they have to make a dish to save themselves from elimination.

programme.title: The Voice S20 Ep14
programme.desc: The four-time Emmy Award-winning musical competition series 'The Voice' returns with the strongest vocalists from across the country invited to compete in the show's newest season.

programme.title: The Good Doctor S4 Ep17
programme.desc: Dr. Shaun Murphy, a young surgeon with autism and savant syndrome, relocates from a quiet country life to join the prestigious St. Bonaventure hospital's surgical unit.

programme.title: New Amsterdam S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Inspired by Bellevue, the oldest public hospital in America, this medical drama follows the charming Dr. Max Goodwin, the institution's newest medical director, who sets out to tear up the bureaucracy.

programme.title: In the Dark S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Murphy and Jess borrow the Guiding Hope van to search for Max, leaving Felix in a precarious position.

programme.title: Can You Keep a Secret?
programme.desc: Thinking they're about to crash, Emma spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane. Later she realize the stranger is her company's young CEO, who now knows every humiliating detail about her.

programme.title: Bigger
programme.desc: The inspirational tale of the grandfathers as we now know it, Joe and Ben Weider. Facing anti-Semitism and extreme poverty, the brothers beat all odds to build an empire and inspire future generations.

programme.title: Mob Town
programme.desc: It is a story about the famed meeting of the heads of the Mafia in 1957 in upstate Apalachin, NY.

programme.title: The Night Clerk
programme.desc: Voyeuristic hotel clerk becomes the subject of a murder investigation.

programme.title: The Bounty Hunter
programme.desc: A bounty hunter learns that his next target is his ex-wife, a reporter working on a murder cover-up. Soon after their reunion, the always-at-odds duo find themselves on a run-for-their-lives adventure.

programme.title: FAST and FURIOUS
programme.desc: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

programme.title: Hard Kill
programme.desc: The work of billionaire tech CEO Donovan Chalmers (Willis) is so valuable that he hires mercenaries to protect it, and a terrorist group kidnaps his daughter just to get it.

programme.title: I Used to Go Here
programme.desc: 35-year-old writer Kate is invited to speak at her alma matter by her former professor. After accepting the invitation, Kate finds herself deeply enmeshed in the lives of a group of college students.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: When Anderton discovers that he has been identified as the future killer of a man he's never met, he is forced to become a fugitive from his own colleagues.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Following their win at the world championship, the now separated Bellas reunite for one last singing competition at an overseas USO tour, but face a group who uses both instruments and voices.

programme.title: Five Feet Apart
programme.desc: A pair of teenagers with cystic fibrosis meet in a hospital and fall in love, though their disease means they must avoid close physical contact.

programme.title: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
